text: They had been married for six years, but the salary raise, on the expectation of which they had done so, had not materialised. "Do you know, I had to send back our bedroom furniture in the second year," she moaned. She had contacts in political circles, a schoolfriend of hers having married Lester Peron, a Mocrat Senator with a seat on the (literally) all-powerful Rocket Release Board.
